SEARCH
Package com.example.simplenotemanager

Klasse Controller

java.lang.Object
com.example.simplenotemanager.Controller
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api") public class Controller extends Object
The controller handles incoming HTTP REST requests and calls the corresponding service method. Dependency injection is performed via constructor injection.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Controller

      @Autowired public Controller(NoteService noteService)

  • Methodendetails

    • findAllNotes

      @GetMapping("/list") public Iterable<Note> findAllNotes()
      Get all available note entries. The endpoint is /api/list with the GET method.
      Gibt zurück:
      Iterable of Note

    • findNoteById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public Note findNoteById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Get a stored note by passing the ID. The endpoint is /api/{id} with the GET method.
      Parameter:
      id -
      Gibt zurück:

    • addNote

      @PostMapping public void addNote(@RequestBody Note note)
      Put a new note to the storage. The endpoint is /api/ with the POST method.
      Parameter:
      note - consisting of title and text contained in the body of the request

    • deleteNote

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public void deleteNote(@PathVariable Long id)
      Remove the note from the storage matching a specific id. The endpoint is /api/{id} with the DELETE method.
      Parameter:
      id - ID of the note, which is deleted

    • updateNote

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public void updateNote(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody Note note)
      Change the note entry (title and text) of a specific id in the storage. The endpoint is /api/{id} with the PUT method.
      Parameter:
      id - ID of the note, which is updated
      note - Containing the new note data
